nodes.text: The S-43 enforcer droid was a battle droid developed by Hutts to protect their holdings or gain more territory. They were based off of stolen plans by the Confederacy of Independent Systems for battle droids, it went through a couple of changes including upgraded processors and integrated weaponry; the Hutts decided to not include reinforcement.
The S-43 enforcer droid was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
